Unreal Speech Documentation

Slash Text-to-Speech Costs by up to 90%

Get Started
Get API Key

Cost Efficiency

Unreal Speech offers significant savings on text-to-speech services compared to other major providers.

Quality of Voices

Unreal Speech provides high-quality voices suitable for various types of content

API Endpoints

Different API endpoints are available for varying lengths of text, supporting both short and long-form content

Per-Word Timestamp

Unleash Speech includes a feature for highlighting words in sync with speech, offering a detailed control for audio synchronization

Rapid Audio Generation

Unreal Speech is designed for real-time applications and can quickly generate long-form audio, making it suitable for a range of applications.

Commercial Use

Audio generated with Unreal Speech can be used commercially with different terms of use had on the subscription plan
